Package fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.rendezvous.examples

Class SimNode

java.lang.Object
fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.rendezvous.AbstractGridNode
fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.rendezvous.examples.SimNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable<CtrlNode>, Observer, GridNode
public class SimNode extends AbstractGridNode implements Observable<CtrlNode>, Observer

An example 'simulator' node.

This node understands two message types, MSG_CTRL_TO_SIM1 and MSG_CTRL_TO_SIM2 (cf. constructor).

Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 9 ao√ªt 2021

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SimNode()
    This constructors sets a Rendezvous using a single RendezvousProcess in response to its two message types.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage​(int msgType, Object payload)
      Description copied from interface: Observable
      Sends a message to all registered observers. Messages are typed so that different actions can be triggered in the observer, based on type.
      Specified by:
      sendMessage in interface Observable<CtrlNode>
      Parameters:
      msgType - the message type
      payload - a payload to send to all observers
